<title level="1" right="Spell 8" pfs="Standard">
[Divine Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=81)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 331 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

**Bloodlines**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=2), [Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=3), [Diabolic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

**Target** allies in the area
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Divine power wards the targets, granting each a +1 status bonus to AC and saves while in the area.

 Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. The bonuses granted by the spell increase to +2 against attacks by—and effects created by—creatures with an alignment opposite to the spell (lawful if you chose chaotic, evil if you chose good). These bonuses increase to +4 against effects created by such creatures that attempt to impose the [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6) condition on a target of your _divine aura_, as well as against attacks made by creatures summoned by anything opposite in alignment to your _divine aura_.

 When a creature of opposite alignment hits a target with a melee attack, the creature must succeed at a Will save or be [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 minute. It's then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

 The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, the _divine aura_'s radius grows 10 feet.
name: Divine Aura
